text: int main ( void ) { int n , t , i , a [ 1000000 ] , l = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) ; { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] ) ; } for ( i = 0 ; i < n - 1 ; i ++ ) { if ( a [ i ] <= a [ i + 1 ] ) l ++ ; } -- l ; } printf ( "%d" , l + n ) ; return 0 ; }
